comment.author: 97642025@N00
comment._content: Hello, I believe this should be the USCGC Northwind (WAGB-282). In 1953, the USS Burton Island was cruising in the Arctic and Alaska area, and had a pennant number of AG-88 (and later, as a Coast Guard Cutter, pennanted as WAGB-283). See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USCGC_Northwind_%28WAGB-282%29 and commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:USCGC_Northwind_%28WA...
